snippet: CUTLER--Wallace M.,formerly of New York City, died on July 3rd at age 93. He had a career as a sound engineer in the sound and motion picture industry and received an Emmy award. He was a member of Local 52 and the NYRC, The Melrose Chapter. He is...
lead_paragraph: CUTLER--Wallace M.,formerly of New York City, died on July 3rd at age 93. He had a career as a sound engineer in the sound and motion picture industry and received an Emmy award. He was a member of Local 52 and the NYRC, The Melrose Chapter. He is survived by his son, Edward and locally his niece, Jacqueline Braunthal. Burial is private. Donations can be made to the New York Roadrunner's Club, Melrose Chapter and Local 52-Sound and Motion Picture Union. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  CUTLER, WALLACE M.
